is a small, mostly agricultural village located in

There are many local buses from Quetzaltenango going toward Zunil. You can catch the ride from either the Minerva bus terminal or Rotonda bus terminal. Many Spanish language schools for example, El Proyecto Baul http://www.elbaulschool.com, Guate Spanish http://www.guatespanish.org organize a trip also.

It is well known in the area for its beautiful Catholic Church. Stop in for a cigarette and cocktail with San Simon.  You will need to ask around to see where he is but it is worth the time to find him.

Market Day: Monday
